Section.about_paragraph_1: As a front-end developer, I design interfaces that are both attractive and high-performing.
Section.about_paragraph_2: What motivates me is bringing projects with a tangible impact to life. Combining technical rigor with a sense of design.

description.negatifplus: Store specializing in photographic equipment, accessories, and services.
description.zefirent: Rental of commercial and heavy goods vehicles tailored to business needs.
description.blockfire: Block'Fire is a company selling a compact, automatic fire-extinguishing ball.
description.stentor: Group providing services in accounting, wealth management, and social protection.

negatifplus.title: Négatif+
negatifplus.subtitle: E-commerce
negatifplus.about_paragraph: Négatif+ is an e-commerce website dedicated to photography equipment, accessories and services for both enthusiasts and professionals.

zefirent.title: Zefirent
zefirent.subtitle: Vehicle Rental
zefirent.about_paragraph: Zefirent offers commercial and heavy vehicle rentals for businesses, with flexible terms, maintenance, and fleet support to simplify professional transport.

blockfire.title: Block'Fire
blockfire.subtitle: E-commerce
blockfire.about_paragraph: Block'Fire is a company that offers an innovative fire safety product: an automatic fire-extinguishing ball that activates on impact or upon contact with fire, providing easy and effective protection for homes, vehicles, and businesses.

stentor.title: Groupe Stentor
stentor.subtitle: Services
stentor.about_paragraph: Groupe Stentor supports individuals, self-employed professionals, and businesses with accounting, wealth management, and retirement planning services to secure and structure their long-term financial future.
